com.tilgnerka.draw

Class DrawHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tilgnerka.draw.DrawHelper

  • public class DrawHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Library to help with drawing geometric shapes in Java and initializing JFrame objects
    Author:
    Robert Gers

      DrawHelper(java.lang.String title, int width, int height)

      DrawHelper(java.lang.String title, javax.swing.JPanel ui, DrawHelper.Position position)

      • DrawHelper

        public DrawHelper(@Nullable
                  java.lang.String title,
                  javax.swing.JPanel ui,
                  DrawHelper.Position position)
        Initializes a fullscreen JFrame with a UI layout and fills the remaining space with RenderablePanel to render custom Shape
        Parameters:
        title - title of the window
        ui - view group to be added to the frame
        position - specifies position of the UI relative to the renderable area

      • DrawHelper

        public DrawHelper(@Nullable
                  java.lang.String title,
                  int width,
                  int height)
        Initializes a JFrame with a UI layout and fills the remaining space with RenderablePanel to render custom Shape
        Parameters:
        title - title of the window
        width - x-size of the window, -1 for fullscreen
        height - y-size of the window, -1 for fullscreen

      • DrawHelper

                  java.lang.String title,
                  int width,
                  int height,

        Parameters:
        title - title of the window
        width - x-size of the window, -1 for fullscreen
        height - y-size of the window, -1 for fullscreen
        ui - view group to be added to the frame
        position - specifies position of the UI relative to the renderable area
